snippet: Société Générale of France has announced an agreement to achieve about 880 "voluntary departures" in its domestic investment banking business, joining other banks that are planning job reductions in response to Europe's debt crisis.
abstract: Société Générale of France has announced an agreement to achieve about 880 "voluntary departures" in its domestic investment banking business, joining other banks that are planning job reductions in response to Europe's debt crisis.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- Less than a week into the new year, European banks are already planning new job cuts.

headline.main: European Banks Prepare More Job Cuts
